menu.title: Guided Journey
menu.description: Experience how God guided different people in the Bible through their journeys. Explore interactive maps, learn theological insights, and answer questions at each step of these divine journeys.

error.title: Journey Interrupted
error.loadFailed: Unable to prepare this journey. Please try again.

quiz.title: The Journey Continues...
quiz.subtitle: Answer correctly to proceed to the next location.

finished.title: Journey Complete!
finished.message: You have completed this biblical journey and experienced how God guided His people. May these insights guide your own walk with God.
